DSS DEAR SIRS
DMR DEAR MR
MADS MY DEAR SIR
USEN YOURS SINCERELY
UVSEN YOURS VERY SINCERELY
VSEN VERY SINCERELY
VSENU VERY SINCERELY YOURS
SENU SINCERELY YOURS
VR VERY RESPECTFULLY
KU CORDIALLY YOURS
VKU VERY CORDIALLY YOURS
AMNR I AM IN RECEIPT
UERR WE ARE IN RECEIPT
AMNRFA I AM IN RECEIPT (OF) (YOUR) FAVOR
UERRFA WE ARE IN RECEIPT (OF) (YOUR) FAVOR
AMNRLE I AM IN RECEIPT (OF) (YOUR) LETTER
